Uses of Class
com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils.Colour

  • Packages that use Colour 
    Package Description
    com.n9mtq4.logwindow
    Contains the BaseConsole.
    com.n9mtq4.logwindow.ui
    This package contains classes that allow user interaction to the BaseConsole.
    com.n9mtq4.logwindow.ui.uis
    This package contains some implementations of ConsoleUI.
    com.n9mtq4.logwindow.utils
    This package contains utils like Colour, JarLoader, and a bundled ReflectionHelper.

      void SimpleConsoleUI.setDefaultTextColour(Colour defaultTextColour)
      Sets the default text colour to use when one is not specified
      The super class will set the colour in print to whatever is set here - no need to do anything.
